name: GDIntercept
description: A tool to intercept and modify GD requests.

issues.info: Inform issues through the repository issues page.

code-settings.name: Code Settings
code-settings.description: Settings related to the user interface.

theme.name: Theme
theme.description: The theme of the code block.

snapping-aggression.name: Snapping Aggression
snapping-aggression.description: The amount of update cycles between each scroll axis lock in the code block.

censor-data.name: Censor Sensitive Data
censor-data.description: Censors all known sensitive keys in GD and some common sensitive keys.

raw-data.name: Raw Data
raw-data.description: Displays data in its raw state without any manipulation of the text besides capping the amount of rendered characters.

minimize-side-menu.name: Minimize Side Menu
minimize-side-menu.description: Minimizes the side menu to only show icons.

list-settings.name: List Settings
list-settings.description: Settings related to the request list.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: Filters out requests from specific sources.

hide-badges.name: Hide Badges
hide-badges.description: Hides the badge icons in the request list.

proxy-settings.name: Proxy Settings
proxy-settings.description: Settings related to the proxy server.

confirm-pause-between-plays.name: Confirm Pause Between Plays
confirm-pause-between-plays.description: If this is enabled, GDI will remember the pause option between session.

cache-limit.name: Cache Limit
cache-limit.description: The amount of requests to cache before removing the oldest one.

log-requests.name: Log Requests
log-requests.description: Logs all requests made in the current session to the Geode console.
